positions.subtitle: Technology Students'​ Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: ▪ Led a team of 12 Subcommittee Secretaries functioning under Sports and Games Committee, elected by an electorate of over 12,500 students▪ Led initiatives in multiple spheres to improve athletes' performance; eventually winning the Inter IIT General Championship after 14 years with record points▪ Digitalised the slot booking process for sporting arenas; played a crucial role in organising pan-IIT Win India movement to improve fitness during pandemic
positions.title: General Secretary Sports and Games
positions.description_html:
▪ Led a team of 12 Subcommittee Secretaries functioning under Sports and Games Committee, elected by an electorate of over 12,500 students
▪ Led initiatives in multiple spheres to improve athletes' performance; eventually winning the Inter IIT General Championship after 14 years with record points
▪ Digitalised the slot booking process for sporting arenas; played a crucial role in organising pan-IIT Win India movement to improve fitness during pandemic

positions.subtitle: Technology Students'​ Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: ▪ Worked under President, Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur to carry out students' activities under Sports and Games Committee▪ Managed the allocated budget of INR 2.40 Lakhs; conducting NSO trials, Freshers' Tournament, Navneet Memorial Tournament & General Championships as head of Football Subcommittee

experience.title: Software Development Engineer
experience.description: Formulated algorithm for compression of bus route points of major cities in District of Columbia, USA; represented by latitudes & longitudes; using Haversine formula and binary classification. Alongside developed tools for validation of algorithm through visual validation.
experience.description_html: Formulated algorithm for compression of bus route points of major cities in District of Columbia, USA; represented by latitudes & longitudes; using Haversine formula and binary classification. Alongside developed tools for validation of algorithm through visual validation. <!---->

experience.title: Market Analyst
experience.description: ▪ Actively participated as an Energy Market Trader and devised trading strategies in futures contract of West Texas Intermediate Crude oil, Heating oil & RBOB▪ Formulated strategies based on fundamental analysis by analyzing EIA, API reports and market news; and technical analysis through scrutinizing price-volume action, support-resistance levels, chart, breakout patterns & technical indicators
experience.description_html: ▪ Actively participated as an Energy Market Trader and devised trading strategies in futures contract of West Texas Intermediate Crude oil, Heating oil & RBOB▪ Formulated strategies based on fundamental analysis by analyzing EIA, API reports and market news; and technical analysis through scrutinizing price-volume action, support-resistance levels, chart, breakout patterns & technical indicators <!---->

experience.title: Overall Coordinator
experience.description: ▪ Organised the 54th Inter IIT Sports Meet co-hosted by IIT Kharagpur and IIT Bhubaneswar; thus looking after the hospitality of 3000 students, 1200 staffs & 750 referees▪ Spearheaded a 4-tier team managing 13 sports, 500+ matches, guest lectures, cultural nights, recreational activities & gala dinner

projects: [{"title":"Distinguish Different Operating Zones and Prevent Fault in a Gearbox","start_date":"Sep 2019","end_date":"Jun 2020","description":"▪ Processed time-series sensor data of 4 sensors; identified 7 different operating modes with 89% accuracy using k-means clustering▪ Developed a Python code using Statistical and Machine Learning techniques for adaptive clustering to identify new modes of operation and fault zone"},{"title":"Warranty Analytics","start_date":"Apr 2020","end_date":"May 2020","description":"▪ Performed survival analytics and estimated lifetime of cars using Kaplan-Meier Estimator associated with Days/ Miles run▪ Identified factors (plant, model, region etc.) and their influence on lifetime of a cars by realizing Cox-Proportional Hazard model"}]
